sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Pixel Arena ('we,' 'us,' or 'our'). These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our gaming services, including console and computer rentals, memberships, and related activities. By subscribing to any of our membership plans (Non-Member, Basic, Advanced, Premium, VIP Platinum Team Membership), you agree to comply with these terms.

sections.heading: Membership Plans
sections.content:
- Non-Member: Pay-per-hour access with no commitment.
- Basic: Monthly subscription with 15 hours of playtime and additional benefits.
- Advanced: Monthly subscription with 45 hours of playtime and enhanced perks.
- Premium: Unlimited playtime with exclusive benefits.
- VIP Platinum Team Membership: Designed for teams of up to 20 members, offering unlimited playtime and premium features.

sections.heading: Eligibility
sections.content: You must be at least 18 years old to subscribe to our services unless accompanied by a legal guardian. Memberships are non-transferable and are valid only for the individual or team that purchased them.

sections.heading: Payment and Refunds
sections.content:
Payments for subscriptions are due at the beginning of each billing cycle. All payments are non-refundable unless explicitly stated in writing by Pixel Arena. Late payments may result in suspension of services.

- Subscribers are eligible for a 100% refund if they cancel their account and contact customer service within the first 15 days of their subscription. To request a refund, please email support@pixelarena.com with your account details and reason for cancellation.

sections.heading: Usage Rules
sections.content: Subscribers must adhere to all local laws and regulations while using our services. Any illegal activity, harassment, or disruptive behavior will result in immediate termination of membership without refund. Equipment provided by Pixel Arena must be used responsibly and returned in good condition.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.content: Pixel Arena is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury incurred while using our services or equipment. Subscribers are responsible for any damages caused to equipment during their session.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content, trademarks, and logos associated with Pixel Arena are the property of the company. Unauthorized use of our intellectual property is strictly prohibited.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.content: Pixel Arena reserves the right to terminate any membership or subscription at its discretion, including but not limited to violations of these Terms and Conditions. Termination does not entitle the subscriber to a refund unless eligible under the 15-day refund policy.

sections.heading: Dispute Resolution
sections.content: Any disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions will be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction]. By subscribing, you agree to waive any right to a jury trial.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: Pixel Arena reserves the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Subscribers will be notified of significant changes via email or on-site notices.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: At Pixel Arena, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you subscribe to our services.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content:
We collect the following types of information:
- Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and payment details.
- Usage Data: Hours played, membership type, and preferences.
- Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your experience and track usage patterns.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
- To process and manage your subscription.
- To provide customer support and respond to inquiries.
- To personalize your experience and recommend services.
- To send promotional offers and updates (optional opt-in).
- To comply with legal obligations.

sections.heading: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. Your data may be shared with trusted partners for purposes such as payment processing, marketing, or analytics. We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content:
Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
- Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
- Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information.
- Deletion: Request the deletion of your data, subject to applicable laws.
- Opt-Out: Opt out of receiving promotional communications.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
